name: detectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that can be noticed or discovered: There has been no detectable change in the patient's condition. Tests show the virus is barely detectable in his blood. See
detect
More examplesFewer examplesShe claimed that if you smoke very little, there will probably be no detectable effect on your unborn child.Drinking water in the area is safe and has no detectable levels of the chemical.Some cancers grow and spread before the primary tumor becomes detectable on ultrasound.
